alert.note: Alert for Genesee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 8:45PM EDT until August 24 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Genesee County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 945 PM EDT. * At 844 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Birch Run, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Clio around 850 PM EDT. Mount Morris and Beecher around 855 PM EDT. Flint and Crossroads Village around 900 PM EDT. Burton around 905 PM EDT. Grand Blanc around 915 PM EDT. Goodrich around 920 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Atlas, Rankin and Genesee. People attending Warwick Hills Golf Club should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
